issue.message: This method should be called `getAutoCaptureSessions` such that `autoCaptureSessions` can be accessed as a property from Kotlin; see https://android.github.io/kotlin-guides/interop.html#property-prefixes
This getter should be public such that `codeBundleId` can be accessed as a property from Kotlin; see https://android.github.io/kotlin-guides/interop.html#property-prefixes
This getter should be public such that `notifierType` can be accessed as a property from Kotlin; see https://android.github.io/kotlin-guides/interop.html#property-prefixes
